name: misconstruction
content:
misconstruction noun
(OF MEANING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a failure to understand the meaning or intention of something that someone says or does, or a wrong idea that is based on this failure: She said his ideas were open to misconstruction. It is a misconstruction to consider this policy as counter to human rights principles. Synonyms
misapprehension
misunderstandingRelated words
construction
misconstrue
[ C ] a failure to correctly represent a meaning or intention: This is a deliberate misconstruction of his words. It is completely wrong and a misconstruction to suggest that the residents would have known what to expect. Synonym
misrepresentation
More examplesFewer examplesThis argument is based upon a misconstruction of the legislation.
